name: screen porch shawl
notes:
materials 

- 2 (4) skeins of purl soho’s [quartz][1], 65% merino wool and 35% suri alpaca. each skein is 420 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 625 (1595) total yards required. we used the color autumn oak.
- us 3 (3.25 mm), 32- or 47-inch [circular needles][2], depending on size you are making
- a [stitch marker][3]

gauge
26 stitches and 52 rows = 4 inches in garter stitch

sizes
bandana (shawl)

- finished length of wingspan: 42½ (68) inches
- finished length of each short side: 30 (48) inches
- finished depth: 21 (34) inches

sample: we knit the shawl size.

designed by purl soho designer, [hiromi glover][4]. click [here][5] to see even more of hiromi's work!
